name: Research Data Alliance Foundation
goal: To facilitate the creation of a global data sharing infrastructure, working towards the technical and social bridges to enable open data sharing.
euInitiatives:
Draft European Open Science Agenda; EC Communication: European Cloud Initiative - Building a competitive data and knowledge economy in Europe;
European Open Science Cloud: first draft report from the High Level Expert Group; EU Council conclusions on open, data-intensive and networked research as a driver for faster and wider innovation; Communication: ICT Standardisation Priorities for the Digital Single Market; Digital Single Market
